english.segment1: Tell myself, on the ride home. Getting tired, hating all I've known. Holding on, like it's all I have. Count me out, when it's clear that I, find it hard to say. And you, find it hard to care.
english.segment2: I wanted to see something that's different, something you said would change in me. Wanted to be, anything different, everything you would change in me.
english.segment3: Got this way, upfront but never true. God I'm wrong, it's just the way I am. Crashing down, any chance you hear. Caving in, any chance that you, could see inside of me. And I don't know what to say, It's fine. This isn't Hollywood. So fine, getting in your way.
english.segment4: I wanted to see something that's different, something you said would change in me. Wanted to be, anything different, everything you would change in me.
english.segment5: I'm taking a chance, this could be different. This could be all I'm waiting for. Taking a chance, this could be different. This could be all I'm waiting for.
english.segment6: I wanted to see something that's different, something you said would change in me. Wanted to be, anything different, everything you would change in me.
english.segment7: Something that's different. Something that's different
